name: Gunship
body:
### The Gunship Game Engine

Gunship is an experimental game engine being created as part of my education in the DePaul University game development program. In developing it I am exploring the low-level systems that are fundamental to allowing games to work. The focus of Gunship is both on performance and on usability.

[Documentation](http://excaliburhissheath.github.io/Gunship/documentation/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
